thread.title: Celebrity Big Brother 2017: racism row over Stacy Francis being 'edited out' by housemates in launch show
thread.title_full: Celebrity Big Brother 2017: racism row over Stacy Francis being 'edited out' by housemates in launch show

author: Ben Travis
title: Celebrity Big Brother 2017: racism row over Stacy Francis being 'edited out' by housemates in launch show
text:
Jamie O'Hara Channel 5 
Former Strictly dancer James Jordan argued that “she’s going to kick off more when she’s edited out.” 
Francis appeared shocked at the decision, and was informed by Big Brother: “You have been edited out. 
“This means that you will not receive your possessions, you will wear a beige tracksuit at all times, and you will be excluded from all key moments within the house, starting now.” Celebrity Big Brother 2017 line-up: meet the All Stars and New Stars 
Francis was then made to sit out in the garden while the rest of the housemates remained inside. 
Some viewers accused the decision to ‘edit out’ Francis as racist, with suggestions that the celebrities are attempting to turn her into an ‘angry black woman’ stereotype. If they pick Stacy then I'm pulling the racist card bc that woman has more personality than half of the others in either room #CBB
